alert.note: Alert for Alexander (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 1:13PM CDT until May 13 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau Mississippi River at Thebes ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Thebes. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 33.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 37.0 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
